name: Zero Abyss
description:
Hello guys.

Here is  a small demo of our game, still in development, Zero Abyss.

It's a third person shooter game, where you take control of a soldier coming out of a dieselpunk fantasy and fight to survive the magical abyss which you found yourself trapped into.

You   may  choose from an arsenal of different weapons and abilities to fight the horrors that crawl in the dungeons.

Hope you enjoy it and feel free to drop a comment below!
